shot.primary_lens: Zeiss Supreme Prime 35mm T1.5, focus on the vehicle
shot.composition: Low-angle tracking shot, the SUV filling the lower third of the frame, coastal horizon line on the upper third
shot.camera_motion: Sequence 1 (0-12s): Smooth Steadicam tracking, following the SUV from the rear three-quarters, with a slight lateral movement to emphasize speed. Sequence 2 (12-14s): Smooth transition to wider establishing shot, then slow push-in to capture detail and emotion. Sequence 3 (14-20s): Final close-up with subtle dolly movement, ending on a confident, impactful frame.

physical.posture: Relaxed but focused, hands at '10 and 2' on the steering wheel

wardrobe.jacket: Black or anthracite gray leather jacket, modern cut
wardrobe.shirt: Off-white or light gray crew neck t-shirt

vehicle.model: Premium electric SUV (futuristic design, metallic midnight blue color)

sequences.primary_motion: Dynamic and smooth driving of the SUV on a winding road
sequences.camera_follows: Extended tracking of the primary action

sequences.primary_motion: The subject takes a moment to appreciate the result, showing visible satisfaction. A final confident look, subtle smile, or gesture of approval completes the narrative arc with emotional resonance.
sequences.camera_follows: Close-up on facial expression transitioning to final hero shot

scene.location: Panoramic coastal road (e.g., Big Sur, California or Amalfi Coast, Italy)

layout.road_surface: Immaculate black asphalt, clean white markings
layout.side_elements: Wooden or natural stone guardrail, steep cliffs on the right, deep blue ocean on the left

environment.background: Choppy ocean, clear sky with a few low clouds, warm and low-angle light
environment.vegetation: Mediterranean or coastal vegetation (pines, low shrubs)
environment.temporal_progression: Environment remains consistent throughout the 20-second narrative. Background elements may subtly shift focus as camera moves, but spatial continuity is maintained for coherent storytelling.

lighting.quality: Soft and directional light, warm reflections on the SUV bodywork
lighting.evolution: Lighting remains consistent throughout the 20-second sequence, maintaining the established mood. Subtle adjustments in intensity during the final 6 seconds to emphasize the emotional climax and create visual impact.

color_grading.palette: Warm tones (oranges, yellows) contrasting with the deep blues of the ocean and SUV
color_grading.tone: Cinematic, rich, saturated, with deep blacks and soft highlights

audio.ambient: Subtle sound of wind, distant waves crashing on rocks
audio.foley: Sequence 1 (0-12s): Tire rolling noise on asphalt, minimalist steering wheel clicks, futuristic and discreet electric motor sound. Sequence 2: Additional environmental sounds, subtle interactions with objects, breathing, fabric movement. Sequence 3: Final satisfying sound (smile, exhale, object placement), ambient fade.
audio.music: Minimalist and sophisticated electronic track, moderate tempo, subtle crescendo. The score builds progressively over 20 seconds, starting subtly and crescendoing toward the final moment. Emotional peak at 14-18s, then resolving with a confident, memorable final chord at 20s.

visual_rules.frame_purity: without text overlays, logos unless branded, no subtitles, focus on hyperrealism and cinematic quality

quality_requirements.high_fidelity_details: Fine details on road texture and bodywork reflections

visual_rules.realism: Realistic physics of liquids and food (pouring, steam, condensation). Vibrant and appetizing colors under optimal lighting. Macro details of food textures (shine, moisture). Professional visual composition of food styling.
visual_rules.continuity: Consistency of steam, condensation, and freshness of food. Maintenance of vibrant colors and appetizing textures. Continuity of food styling lighting. Fluidity of preparation and serving movements.
